overview: 25 minutes of soothing music & videos for your little ones to unwind with.  Instrumental lullaby versions of the Sunday School classics.  1. This Little Light of Mine (Lullaby) 2. Jesus Loves the Little Children (Lullaby) 3. The B-I-B-L-E (Lullaby) 4. Jesus Loves Me (Lullaby) 5. Twinkle Twinkle Little Star (Lullaby) 6. He's Got the Whole World (Lullaby) 7. Praise Ye The Lord (Lullaby) 8. I've Got the Joy Joy Joy (Lullaby)
title: Listener Kids Lullabies
